jsLib: function method(result){ const { java, source, cookie } = this ;result=result.replace(/模擬/g,'模拟');return java.t2s(result)}

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##^\d+\.}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
##.本章完.|【.*分享.*运营.*】|第.*章.*|.*第.*章.*|.*69吧书69新
@js:result
	.replace(/模擬/g,'模拟')
	.replace(/泡麵/g,'泡面')
	.replace(/伱/g,'你')
	.replace(/歷史/g,'历史')
	.replace(/着名/g,'著名')
	.replace(/名着/g,'名著')
	.replace(/着作/g,'著作')
	.replace(/先進/g,'先进')
	.replace(/状態/g,'状态')
	.replace(/號/g,'号')
	.replace(/縈/g,'萦')
	.replace(/[『「]/g,'“')
	.replace(/[』」]/g,'”')
	.replace(/。.*[❻６➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*」/g,'。”')
	.replace(/。.*[❻６➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*/g,'。')
		.replace(/新.*[❻６⑥➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾⑨➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*书吧.*/g,'')

v1.7优化发现页

bookSourceComment:
此书源可以开箱即用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，API来自于共享地址，而共享地址目前仅来自一台云手机
因此，如果你有能力搭建番茄web服务，请尽量自己搭建后共享（如果所有人都选择白嫖而不去搭建，那么所有人都将无法使用此API/书源）
此书源使用Xposed模块番茄Web 搭建
番茄Web地址：因版权原因，请自行搜索
模块下载：自行使用action
书源：Wodlie
项目经过了一些代理节点，会有点慢（云手机→frps云服务器→cloudflare→你）
感谢 移动云手机 freefrp.net https://github.com/AceDroidX/frp-Android 提供部分软件支持
目前免费线路会时不时断线，如果你有经济可以赞助我：
https://ifdian.net/a/Wodlie

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName: title<js>##正文卷.|正文.|VIP章节.|免费章节.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订/万架字票合补加].*?[】）\)]</js>

var info = doc.select("div.panel-body").select("div.col-xs-6");
var updateTime = String(info).match(/更新.{15}/);
var page = String(info).match(/页数.{2,10}/);
var all = updateTime+"  "+page+"P"
result = all
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

bookSourceComment:
永久站：
https://fuhouse.club/bl

ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉

使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了

第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③永久站网址会自动切换成可用网址
④复制当前可用网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的可用网址

注：
若两种情况都无法解决失效问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命

2022.7.10 酷安@乃星

ruleContent.content:
.dht_dl_area@script@html
<js>
function reurl(a){var b='';var c=csplit(a,8).split('\r\n');for(var i=0;i<(c.length-1);i++){b=b+String.fromCharCode((parseInt(c[i],2)-10).toString(10))}return b}

function csplit(a,b,c){b=parseInt(b,10)||76;c=c||'\r\n';if(b<1){return false}return a.match(new RegExp(".{0,"+b+"}","g")).join(c)}

r=result.match(/(reurl[^)]+\))/)[1]
s=eval('('+r+')')
result="magnet:?xt=urn:btih:"+s
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank1 = [
    '全部',
    '推荐',
    '热门',
    '上架'
];
orderby1 = [
    'manga',
    'hots',
    'dayup',
    'newss'
];
for (i in rank1) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby1[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank1[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  地　　区  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank2 = [
    '韩漫',
    '国漫',
    '日漫',
    '欧美',
    '其他'
];
orderby2 = [
    'kr',
    'cn',
    'jp',
    'ou-mei',
    'qita',
];
for (i in rank2) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-genre/${orderby2[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank2[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '复仇','古风','奇幻','逆袭','异能','宅向','穿越','热血',
    '纯爱','系统','重生','冒险','灵异','大女主','剧情','恋爱',
    '玄幻','女神','科幻','魔幻','推理','猎奇','治愈','都市',
    '异形','青春','末日','悬疑','修仙','战斗'
];
link = [
    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

永久站：
https://fuhouse.club/bl
ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉
使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了
第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③永久站网址会自动切换成可用网址
④复制当前可用网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的可用网址
注：
若两种情况都无法解决问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命
2022.7.10 酷安@乃星

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
//java.log(result)
doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
$ = (a) => doc.select(a)
if (/function S2H/.test(result)) {
	function S2H(s){
        var r = [];
        for(var i=0;i<s.length/2;i++){
            r[r.length]= parseInt(s.substr(i*2,2), 16);
        }
        return r;
    }
    var str = S2H(String($('str').html()).replace(/\s/ig,''));
    var key = S2H(String(cookie.getKey(source.getKey(),'key')));
    var x = 0, ret = "";
    for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){
        var d = (str[i] + key[x]);
        if(d>255)d=d%255;
        ret+='%'+('0'+d.toString(16)).substr(-2,2);
        x++; if(x>=key.length) x=0;
    }
    var html = decodeURIComponent(decodeURI(ret));
    $('str').html(html);
}
//java.log(doc)
doc;
</js>

        path = 'comics/' + baseUrl.replace(/.*comics\/(.*)\/eps.*/, '$1') + '/order/' + list[i].order + '/pages?page=1';
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        title = list[i].title;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.unshift({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': url,
            'time': list[i].updated_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '')
        });
    }
    if (pages > 1) {
        for (j = 2; j <= pages; j++) {
            path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*page=).*/, '$1') + j;
            url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
            result = java.ajax(url);
            var list = JSON.parse(result).data.eps.docs;
            for (i in list) {
                path = 'comics/' + baseUrl.replace(/.*comics\/(.*)\/eps.*/, '$1') + '/order/' + list[i].order + '/pages?page=1';
                url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
                title = list[i].title;
                order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
                title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
                data.unshift({
                    'title': title,
                    'link': url,
                    'time': list[i].updated_at.replace(/T/g, ' ').replace(/\..*/g, '')
                });
            }
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
var Result = java.ajax(Get('url') + '/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&mobile=2');
let ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url'));
if (ck.includes('auth=')) {
    var J= org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(Result);
    var user = J.select('.text-center')[1].text();
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), user);
} else {
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"),'');
}
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('auth=')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读记录', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&type=lishi&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url')));
type = J.select('[data-field="category_id"]');
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Jindu = `{{get('jindu',Get('o'))}}`;
Shuxing = `{{get('shuxing',Get('p'))}}`;
Odfie = `{{get('odfie',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=ku${String('&category_id=' + type[j].attr('data-value')).replace(/&category_id=empty/, '')}${Jindu}${Shuxing}&odfie=${Odfie}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

            });
        }

                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': cover,

            });
        }
    } else {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-50');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = String(list[i].select('.image-title').text()).replace(/【.*/, '');
            author = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('author' + name));
            intro = String(list[i].select('.image-title').text()).replace(/.*?(【.*)/, '$1') + '\n' + list[i].select('.image-summary').text();
            cover = list[i].select('img').attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/^\./, '')
            });
        }
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('a=store')) {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[1] || !next_1.select('.col-50')[1]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);

} else {

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxzf-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/favorite?tp=1-{{page}}&apimhstatus=all`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-newest-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('最新', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-cnxh-{{page}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('推荐', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/home/book/cate.html')).select('.tagBtnClass');
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
P = `{{Get('p')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/cate/tp/1-${kind[i].attr('data-value')}-${P}-1-{{page}}-${Q}-1-${O}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].attr('data-value') + kind[i].select('span').text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

    top += 1;

    "headers": Headers

    top += 1;
    cookie.setCookie(baseUrl, `${ck};_va=13;__na=${na};top_banner_counter_1500=${top}`);
    var list = java.getElements('.fed-list-item||.fed-deta-info');
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = list[i].select('.fed-font-xvi.fed-part-eone').text();
        a = String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[0].text()).indexOf('别名') == -1 ? '1' : '0';
        author = String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[4-a].textNodes()[0]).replace(/.*[:：]/, "").replace(/\+\s/g, '/').replace(/[,，+&]/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/amp|;/g, '').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')');
        kind = String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[3-a].textNodes()[0]).replace(/[中已]/, "") + ',' + String(list[i].select('.fed-col-md6 a').text()).replace(/\s/g, ',');
        latest = list[i].select('.fed-list-remarks').text() + '〔' + String(list[i].select('.fed-part-rows li')[5-a].textNodes()[0]) + '〕';
        intro = list[i].select('.fed-part-esan').textNodes()[0];
        cover = list[i].select('.fed-list-pics').attr('data-original');
        cache.put('Cover' + Get('url') + list[i].select('.fed-part-eone a').attr('href'), cover);
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.fed-part-eone a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    var searchkey = java.get(Get('url') + "searchkey");
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.fed-list-item, .fed-deta-info')[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '推荐',
    '最新',
    '热门'
];
orderby = [
    'ranks?date_type=total&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=month&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=week&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=day&_update=true',
    'recs?pos=3200102',
    'comics?ordering=-datetime_updated',
    'comics?ordering=-popular'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/${orderby[i]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','爱情','欢乐向','冒险','奇幻','百合','校园','科幻',
    '东方','耽美','生活','格斗','轻小说','悬疑','神鬼','职场',
    'TL','萌系','治愈','长条','四格','节操','舰娘','竞技',
    '搞笑','伪娘','热血','励志','性转换','彩色','后宫','美食',
    '侦探','AA','音乐舞蹈','魔幻','战争','历史','异世界','惊悚',
    '机战','都市','穿越','恐怖','C100','重生','C99','C101',
    'C97','C96','生存','宅系','武侠','C98','C95','FATE',
    '转生','无修正','仙侠','LoveLive','其他'
];
theme = [
    '','&theme=aiqing','&theme=huanlexiang','&theme=maoxian','&theme=qihuan','&theme=baihe','&theme=xiaoyuan','&theme=kehuan',
    '&theme=dongfang','&theme=danmei','&theme=shenghuo','&theme=gedou','&theme=qingxiaoshuo','&theme=xuanyi','&theme=shengui','&theme=zhichang',
    '&theme=teenslove','&theme=mengxi','&theme=zhiyu','&theme=changtiao','&theme=sige','&theme=jiecao','&theme=jianniang','&theme=jingji',
    '&theme=gaoxiao','&theme=weiniang','&theme=rexue','&theme=lizhi','&theme=xingzhuanhuan','&theme=COLOR','&theme=hougong','&theme=meishi',
    '&theme=zhentan','&theme=aa','&theme=yinyuewudao','&theme=mohuan','&theme=zhanzheng','&theme=lishi','&theme=yishijie','&theme=jingsong',
    '&theme=jizhan','&theme=dushi','&theme=chuanyue','&theme=kongbu','&theme=comiket100','&theme=chongsheng','&theme=comiket99','&theme=comiket101',
    '&theme=comiket97','&theme=comiket96','&theme=shengcun','&theme=zhaixi','&theme=wuxia','&theme=comiket98','&theme=comiket95','&theme=fate',
    '&theme=zhuansheng','&theme=Uncensored','&theme=xianxia','&theme=loveLive','&theme=qita'
];
Ordering = `{{get('ordering',Get('p'))}}`;
Top = `{{get('top',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/comics${Ordering}${Top}${theme[j]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

    return style;
}

    '日阅读',
    '日收藏',
    '周阅读',
    '周收藏',
    '月阅读',
    '月收藏',
    '月投票',
    '总评分'
];

    'day',
    'dayBookcases',
    'week',
    'weekBookcase',
    'month',
    'monthBookcases',
    'voteNumMonthRank',
    'voteRank'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','格斗','武侠','魔幻','魔法','冒险','爱情',
    '搞笑','校园','科幻','后宫','励志','职场','美食','社会',

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes("rank")) {
        var list = java.getElements('.manga-rank');
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].select('.manga-title').text(),
                'author': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[1].text()).replace(/[+·，\|\\]/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/:\//g, ':').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\.\//g, '.'),
                'kind': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[0].text()).replace(/\|/g, ',').replace(/\s/g, ',').replace(/、/g, ','),
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('.manga-rank-cover mip-img').attr('src') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        Data();
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.items;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover.replace(/\\/g, ''),
                'url': Get('url') + '/manga/' + list[i].manga_code
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pn=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pn=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/latest"},"method":"GET"}');
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.items[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架',
    '全部','连载','完结','最近更新','最新上架'
];
name = [
    'hanguo',
    'hanguo-lianzai',
    'hanguo-wanjie',
    'hanguo',
    'hanguo',
    'riben',
    'riben-lianzai',
    'riben-wanjie',
    'riben',
    'riben',
    'dalu',
    'dalu-lianzai',
    'dalu-wanjie',
    'dalu',
    'dalu',
    'oumei',
    'oumei-lianzai',
    'oumei-wanjie',
    'oumei',
    'oumei'
];
type = [
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post',
    'click','click','click','update','post'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/app/comic/index?sort=${type[i]}&filter=${name[i]}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    韩漫    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(6, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    日本    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(12, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    国漫    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(18, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ    欧美    ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
var a = 0;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('username')) {
        Login();
    }
    java.put("mw-sign", cache.get("mw-sign"));
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) { 
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("mw-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/getfavors?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1&order=0&order_type=0&folder_id=0`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url')}}/getHistory?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1`, 1, 0.25, false));
        a = 4;
    }
}
Full = `{{get('full',Get('s'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
Host = `{{Get('p')}}`;
if(Get('t') > 0) {
    title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    Gender = get('gender',Get('o'));
    Area = `{{get('area',Get('u'))}}`;
    Sort = `{{get('sort',Get('v'))}}`;
    var Url = Get('url') + '/booklist?gender=' + Gender;
    var html = java.ajax(Url);
    if(html.includes('html.js')){
        cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
        html = java.startBrowserAwait(Url,"验证").body();
    }
    var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('.panel-tag');
    for (i in kind) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${kind[i].attr('data-val')}&gender=${Gender}${Full}${End}&area=${Area}&sort=${Sort}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
} else {
    title = [
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫'
    ];
    type = [
        '&area=2&sort=-1',
        '&area=2&sort=0',
        '&area=2&sort=1',
        '&area=2&sort=2',
        '&area=3&sort=-1',
        '&area=3&sort=0',
        '&area=3&sort=1',
        '&area=3&sort=2',
        '&area=4&sort=-1',
        '&area=4&sort=0',
        '&area=4&sort=1',
        '&area=4&sort=2',
        '&area=5&sort=-1',
        '&area=5&sort=0',
        '&area=5&sort=1',
        '&area=5&sort=2',
        '&area=6&sort=-1',
        '&area=6&sort=0',
        '&area=6&sort=1',
        '&area=6&sort=2',
        '&area=1&sort=-1',
        '&area=1&sort=0',
        '&area=1&sort=1',
        '&area=1&sort=2'
    ];
    Gender = `{{get('gender',Get('o'))}}`;
    for (i in title) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?gender=${Gender}${Full}${End}${type[i]}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    exploreUrl.splice(0+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨韩国✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(5+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨日漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(10+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨国漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(15+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨台漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(20+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨其他✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(25+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨未分类✨ 　　   ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

//变量比较值

		allNum=parseInt(java.
			          getString("$.data.count"));
		nowNum=parseInt(baseUrl.
     	      match(/\d*}/)[0].replace("}",""));
		if(nowNum*20<allNum){
			  if(nowNum<=cmpnum||cmpnum==0){
			  	  ne=baseUrl.
			  	     replace(/\d*}/,String(++nowNum)+'}');
 	       t.push(ne)
 	    }
			}
}else

 	    }
  }
}else

		nowNum=parseInt(baseUrl.

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
var a = 0;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('username')) {
        Login();
    }
    java.put("mw-sign", cache.get("mw-sign"));
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) { 
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("mw-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/getfavors?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1&order=0&order_type=0&folder_id=0`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url')}}/getHistory?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1`, 1, 0.25, false));
        a = 4;
    }
}
Full = `{{get('full',Get('s'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
Host = `{{Get('p')}}`;
if(Get('t') > 0) {
    title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
    Gender = get('gender',Get('o'));
    Area = `{{get('area',Get('u'))}}`;
    Sort = `{{get('sort',Get('v'))}}`;
    var Url = Get('url') + '/booklist?gender=' + Gender;
    var html = java.ajax(Url);
    if(html.includes('html.js')){
        cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
        html = java.startBrowserAwait(Url,"验证").body();
    }
    var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('.panel-tag');
    for (i in kind) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${kind[i].attr('data-val')}&gender=${Gender}${Full}${End}&area=${Area}&sort=${Sort}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
} else {
    title = [
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
        '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫'
    ];
    type = [
        '&area=2&sort=-1',

        '&area=2&sort=1',
        '&area=2&sort=2',
        '&area=3&sort=-1',

        '&area=3&sort=1',

        '&area=4&sort=0',
        '&area=4&sort=1',
        '&area=4&sort=2',
        '&area=5&sort=-1',
        '&area=5&sort=0',
        '&area=5&sort=1',
        '&area=5&sort=2',
        '&area=6&sort=-1',
        '&area=6&sort=0',
        '&area=6&sort=1',
        '&area=6&sort=2',
        '&area=1&sort=-1',
        '&area=1&sort=0',
        '&area=1&sort=1',
        '&area=1&sort=2'
    ];
    Gender = `{{get('gender',Get('o'))}}`;
    for (i in title) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?gender=${Gender}${Full}${End}${type[i]}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    exploreUrl.splice(0+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨韩国✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(5+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨日漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(10+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨国漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(15+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨台漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(20+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨其他✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.splice(25+a, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨未分类✨ 　　   ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (java.ajax(Get('url')).includes(Account)) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxzf-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/favorite?tp=1-{{page}}&apimhstatus=all`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-newest-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('最新', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-cnxh-{{page}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('推荐', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/home/book/cate.html')).select('.tagBtnClass');
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
P = `{{Get('p')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/cate/tp/1-${kind[i].attr('data-value')}-${P}-1-{{page}}-${Q}-1-${O}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].attr('data-value') + kind[i].select('span').text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
var Result = java.ajax(Get('url') + '/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&mobile=2');
let ck = cookie.getCookie(Get('url'));
if (ck.includes('auth=')) {
    var J= org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(Result);
    var user = J.select('.text-center')[1].text();
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), user);
} else {
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"),'');
}
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('auth=')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));

        intro = String(list[i].select('.item-title').text()).replace(/.*?(【.*)/, '$1') + '\n' + list[i].select('.item-subtitle').text();
        cover = list[i].select('img').attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + '/' + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    var searchkey = java.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"));
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.tabul li')[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>
